name: Worthless Unicorn
description:
In Worthless Unicorn, you run a new Startup company that's bound to fail! See how long you can keep your Key Operating Measures from hitting zero while battling crisis after crisis in this card management game.

Controls:

  • Mouse for clicking/dragging
  • Backspace to restart

How to Play:

  1. Drag Skills from your hand onto each Day in the Plan area
  2.  Commit to the Plan by pressing the green arrow
  3. Drag a Skill Bank onto an Event to meet its requirements 
  4. Pick a Day's discard pile to add to your draw deck 
  5. Repeat until your startup fails by not maintaining your Key Operating Metrics at the top of the screen.
